title: Is it just me, or did that new HUD rock?
body:
I saw a lot of outcry over the new interface that Riot implemented, it seemed as though everyone hated it. But I'm here to say that I actually loved it. When I hopped on today, I noticed they'd taken it down. Why? Was there a problem with it, or did Riot just backdown from a good idea because people don't like new things?
BRING THE NEW HUD BACK! I loved it. And I doubt I was the only one.

replies.body: They haven't implemented it in Ranked yet, It's only in Normals and Customs.
how do you ping with the new hud

The hotkey...

I'm actually surprised that people used the buttons above the minimap.
I do alert pings in line from my lane in the direction of the roam using the mini map so my mouse was crossing the button anyway
The hotkeys for pings are v and g (defaults.)
The exact way you ping in the old hud.
They're tweaking the new one on the PBE, from what I saw on Surrenderat20. I like what they are doing with it.

There were nice things about it, but really bad weaknesses as well. It doesn't matter how nice a HUD looks if you can't read it or find the info you need. The adjustments they are making on the PBE will help it tons.

Oh hey, check that out. Looks like I didn't check my information properly. Thanks for correcting me guys, and for some love on the HUD. I played a ranked game this morning, first one in a long time, and I noticed it was gone. So naturally I thought that they had removed it, but they will be implementing it shortly. Exciting news indeed.
I still hate it and wish I could choose to go with the old HUD.

Check this:
http://mapskins.com/2015/07/29/season-4-hud/

Best regards.

Btw. Have you guys noticed that posts about the New HUD sucking started dying out... I wonder why, **maybe because they played more than one game with it and actually started getting used to it and realizing it's superior in nearly every way to the old one?**

Superior in nearly every way? I don't know about that, man. The wee little icons for your team mates in the bottom right really gets on my nerves, especially when nearly every other game I can think of with multiple players or team maters has them full on the left side. There's... probably a reason for that.

Same reason there stopped being a complain thread every few minutes about Fiora because Riot said they were taking the feedback into consideration.

Stop trying to act like you won something, when the people that were complaining were obviously heard as Riot is making changes to the HUD as we speak in numerous ways (not overhauling it or anything, but adding a lot more readability to a lot of areas).

Or those of us who don't like the new HUD realized we weren't gonna get it back and went and played SMITE.
Brought to you by my new MOBA addiction, SMITE

I think that League of Legends should give us the option of old HUD or the new HUD.  That is my personal opinion.   It's not that I don't like the new HUD but I am more used to the old HUD.  So I am just pointing this out because I feel that I am not the only one who feels this way.

I used to think it was bad, but I really like it because everything's there! Also on the PBE riot put the score, kda, and cs on the top right corner again.

I tried DOTA 2 a little bit and the character dialogue made me gtfo. Razor wouldn't shut up about lightning and electricity related puns, the sniper called Sniper only talked about sniping. A video I saw where I learned that upon selecting the character Earthshaker his quote is "There may be many earths, but there is only one Earthshaker" made sure I would never go back. 

Also the sky high learning curve with low level bots completely wrecking me from off-screen even though I've had experience from League kind of destroyed any desire I had to try the game.

What is that direction though? The only info you've given is that you will leave because of the new HUD. I like the new HUD a lot, but if I didn't it wouldn't really mean anything. I would literally just say whatever and carry on.

You must be a woman if you must nitpick at everything that I say....  But if you must desperately listen to me plead my case... I believe that the game should stay true to its roots, there are a lot of changes with the items, gameplay,  and champion mechanics that I do not exactly agree on, however the hud change was the icing on the cake.  I have been playing since the beginning, I have seen many, many changes made to this game, some for the better and some for the worse, the changes that I deem "For the worse," have heavily outweighed the "for the betters;" I feel that after all of these years this is my time part ways and move onto something else, like DoTA 2.
I love it too.  I miss it in ranked.  Glad to see it's coming in 5.15.
i have been playing with it in the past few days. i think i prefer it over the previous one, although i dont see any real differences.
My favorite part about it is being able to left click my opponent to check their cs instead of needing to tab because i'm mildly obsessed with staying even or ahead before one of us dies
I hated it, but all the changes on PBE look like a good improvement and I feel like it's going to really help my opinion of it.

My only problem is with the surrender window. The HUD has tiny aspects, and I love that, but it's strange they didn't fix the surrender window. It even rides on top of the champ icons, which really hurts gameplay.
I like the way the hud looks and the ult timers I just like the placement of things. It does not use the left side of the screen at all and on a 1900x1080 screen it looks really bad
bruh its still here just not in ranked
